dialogue.line: Molly?
God he's annoying, isn't he?
...Who?
Lucas.
You know, your son?
I-I don't -
He just never knows when to leave me alone!
I'm trying to watch some goddamn television...
...and he's just standing at the bottom of the stairs crying!
Molly, what are you talking about-
Let me finish!
I know he wants me to say something to him...
...so I turn around and say “What do you want?”
Then he says “I miss my Mum”.
When I look back at the TV I realised that while he was snivelling away...
I'd missed who got sent home from American Idol!
So I turn back to the snot-nosed brat and say,
“Well, what the fuck do you want me to do about it?"
Then he just runs back upstairs again.
I mean, why did he even come down in the first place?!
I thought you raised him better than that, Raymond.
Oh, that's right...
You didn't raise him.
